noun.description: The civil force of a national or local government, responsible for the prevention and detection of crime and the maintenance of public order.
synonyms: the forces of law and order

verb.description: (of a police force) have the duty of maintaining law and order in or for (an area or event).

origin: Late 15th century (in the sense public order): from French, from medieval Latin politia citizenship, government (see policy). Current senses date from the early 19th century.
